head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NEGER, GEORGE H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NEGER, GEORGE H.

block.p: NEGER-George H. Age 98 of Riverdale, NY. Beloved husband of Sadie (Landsman). Devoted father of Lois Laitman and Shirley Benjamin. Loving grandfather of five granchildren and 12 great grandchildren. Services Friday 10:00 AM ''Wien & Wien'' 129 Engle St, Englewood, NJ. Contributions to Cabrini Hospice or your favorite charity.
